fact_report.claim: Matter runs over IP networks (Wi-Fi, Ethernet) and Thread, requiring at least one Thread border router such as Apple HomePod mini or Google Nest Hub (2nd gen) for low-power devices.

sources.name: Connectivity Standards Alliance — Matter Introduction
sources.quote: Matter operates over IP, taking advantage of Wi-Fi and Ethernet for higher bandwidth devices and Thread for low-power mesh; Thread border routers such as HomePod mini or Nest Hub connect Thread to the IP network.

sources.name: Apple HomePod mini Tech Specs
sources.quote: HomePod mini is a Thread border router, enabling communication with compatible smart home accessories.

fact_report.notes: List of supported hubs is accurate.

fact_report.claim: Matter 1.2 added device categories including refrigerators, room air conditioners, dishwashers, laundry appliances, robot vacuums, and air quality sensors in 2023.

sources.name: CSA Matter 1.2 Release Notes (Oct 2023)
sources.quote: Matter 1.2 expands support to nine new device types such as refrigerators, room air conditioners, dishwashers, laundry dryers, robot vacuums, and air quality sensors.

fact_report.notes: Article references fridge sensors/air purifiers correctly.

fact_report.claim: Aqara P2 motion/contact sensors use Matter-over-Thread and run on replaceable coin-cell batteries lasting roughly a year.

sources.name: Aqara P2 Product Page
sources.quote: Door and Window Sensor P2 supports Matter-over-Thread and is powered by a CR2032 battery lasting up to two years.

fact_report.claim: Eve Room measures VOC, temperature, and humidity locally with optional iCloud sync, aligning with privacy guidance.

sources.name: Eve Room (2022) Tech Specs
sources.quote: Eve Room tracks indoor air quality (VOC), temperature, and humidity with on-device processing; data stays local unless iCloud syncing is enabled.

research_log.quote: Matter runs over IP using Wi-Fi/Ethernet and Thread for low-power mesh; Thread border routers bridge Thread networks.
HomePod mini includes a built-in Thread radio that acts as a border router.
Matter 1.2 expands support to appliances such as refrigerators, dishwashers, and laundry machines.
Sensor P2 uses Matter-over-Thread and ships with a CR2032 battery (up to 2 years).
Eve Room monitors VOC, temperature, humidity locally; data remains on device unless synced via iCloud.
